short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables Google Chrome omnibox to search Service-Now tickets by entering "sn" and ticket number.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google chrome omnibox extension to open Service-Now ticket directly through browser. 

Just type "sn <ticket_number>" to directly go to that ticket. 

You can enter RTASK, STASK, SRQ, SITM, CTASK, CRQ, INC, etc. number at <ticket_number> place in above syntax.
